00001 package liquibase.database;

00003 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;

00009 import java.text.ParseException;
00010 import java.text.SimpleDateFormat;
00011 
00012 public class DB2Database extends AbstractDatabase {
00013     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00014         return getDatabaseProductName(conn).startsWith("DB2");
00015     }
00016 
00017     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00018         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:db2")) {
00019             return "com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver";
00020         }
00021         return null;
00022     }
00023 
00024     public String getProductName() {
00025         return "DB2";
00026     }
00027 
00028     public String getTypeName() {
00029         return "db2";
00030     }

00032     protected String getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName() throws JDBCException {//NOPMD
00033         return super.getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName().toUpperCase();
00034     }

00036     public boolean supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns() {
00037         return false;
00038     }
00039 
00040     public String getAutoIncrementClause() {
00041         return "GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY";
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00045         return "CURRENT TIMESTAMP";
00046     }

00048     public String getBooleanType() {
00049         return "SMALLINT";

00053         return "1";

00057         return "0";

00073     public String getDateLiteral(String isoDate) {
00074         String normalLiteral = super.getDateLiteral(isoDate);
00075 
00076         if (isDateOnly(isoDate)) {
00077             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00078             val.append("DATE(");
00079             val.append(normalLiteral);
00080             val.append(')');
00081             return val.toString();
00082         } else if (isTimeOnly(isoDate)) {
00083             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00084             val.append("TIME(");
00085             val.append(normalLiteral);
00086             val.append(')');
00087             return val.toString();
00088         } else if (isDateTime(isoDate)) {
00089             StringBuffer val = new StringBuffer();
00090             val.append("TIMESTAMP(");
00091             val.append(normalLiteral);
00092             val.append(')');
00093             return val.toString();
00094         } else {
00095             return "UNSUPPORTED:" + isoDate;
00096         }
00097     }
00098

00119     public SqlStatement createFindSequencesSQL(String schema) throws JDBCException {
00120         return new RawSqlStatement("SELECT SEQNAME AS SEQUENCE_NAME FROM SYSCAT.SEQUENCES WHERE SEQTYPE='S' AND SEQSCHEMA = '" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schema) + "'");
00121     }
00122 
00123 
00124     public boolean shouldQuoteValue(String value) {
00125         return super.shouldQuoteValue(value)
00126                 && !value.startsWith("\"SYSIBM\"");
00127     }
00128 
00129 
00130     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00131         return true;
00132     }

00134     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00135         return new RawSqlStatement("select view_definition from SYSIBM.VIEWS where TABLE_NAME='" + name + "' and TABLE_SCHEMA='" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName) + "'");
00136     }
00137 
00138     public String getViewDefinition(String schemaName, String name) throws JDBCException {
00139         return super.getViewDefinition(schemaName, name).replaceFirst("CREATE VIEW \\w+ AS ", ""); //db2 returns "create view....as select
00140     }
00141 
00142     public Object convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(Object defaultValue, int dataType, int columnSize, int decimalDigits) throws ParseException {
00143         if (defaultValue != null && defaultValue instanceof String) {
00144             if (dataType == Types.TIMESTAMP) {
00145                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\"SYSIBM\".\"TIMESTAMP\"\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)", "");
00146             } else if (dataType == Types.TIME) {
00147                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\"SYSIBM\".\"TIME\"\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)", "");
00148             } else if (dataType == Types.DATE) {
00149                 defaultValue = ((String) defaultValue).replaceFirst("^\"SYSIBM\".\"DATE\"\\('", "").replaceFirst("'\\)", "");
00150             }
00151         }
00152         return super.convertDatabaseValueToJavaObject(defaultValue, dataType, columnSize, decimalDigits);
00153     }
00154 
00155     protected java.util.Date parseDate(String dateAsString) throws DateParseException {
00156         try {
00157             if (dateAsString.indexOf(' ') > 0) {
00158                 return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss").parse(dateAsString);
00159             } else if (dateAsString.indexOf('.') > 0 && dateAsString.indexOf('-') > 0) {
00160                 return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd-HH.mm.ss.SSSSSS").parse(dateAsString);
00161 
00162             } else {
00163                 if (dateAsString.indexOf(':') > 0) {
00164                     return new SimpleDateFormat("HH:mm:ss").parse(dateAsString);
00165                 } else if (dateAsString.indexOf('.') > 0) {
00166                     return new SimpleDateFormat("HH.mm.ss").parse(dateAsString);
00167                 } else {
00168                     return new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").parse(dateAsString);
00169                 }
00170             }
00171         } catch (ParseException e) {
00172             throw new DateParseException(dateAsString);
00173         }
00174     }
00175 
00176     public String convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00177         if (requestedSchema == null) {
00178             return getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName();
00179         } else {
00180             return requestedSchema.toUpperCase();
00181         }
00182     }
00183 
00184     public String convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00185         return null;
00186     }
00187 
00188     public String generatePrimaryKeyName(String tableName) {
00189         String pkName = super.generatePrimaryKeyName(tableName);
00190         if (pkName.length() > 18) {
00191             pkName = pkName.substring(0, 17);
00192         }
00193         return pkName;
00194     }
00195 
00196     public boolean isColumnAutoIncrement(String schemaName, String tableName, String columnName) throws SQLException, JDBCException {
00197         boolean autoIncrement = false;
00198 
00199         PreparedStatement stmt = null;
00200         try {
00201             stmt = getConnection().prepareStatement("SELECT IDENTITY FROM SYSCAT.COLUMNS WHERE TABSCHEMA = ? AND TABNAME = ? AND COLNAME = ? AND HIDDEN != 'S'");
00202             stmt.setString(1, convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName));
00203             stmt.setString(2, tableName);
00204             stmt.setString(3, columnName);
00205 
00206             ResultSet rs = stmt.executeQuery();
00207 
00208             while (rs.next()) {
00209                 String identity = rs.getString("IDENTITY");
00210                 if (identity.equalsIgnoreCase("Y")) {
00211                     autoIncrement = true;
00212                 }
00213             }
00214             rs.close();
00215         } finally {
00216             if (stmt != null)
00217             {
00218                 stmt.close();
00219             }
00220         }
00221 
00222         return autoIncrement;
00223     }
